mention.text: the NRA , which backs the McClure bill To Handgun Control Inc. , the most visible lobby for pistol regulation , the issue is what the group calls the NRA 's extremism `` Cop-killer bullets , mail-order handguns , machine guns ... has the NRA gone off the deep end
advertising agencies very wealthy Handgun Control Inc. 's flag-waving and fund-raising
a former NRA official who now publishes John Aquilino own gun owners ' newsletter `` believers 're making advertising agencies very wealthy Handgun Control Inc. 's flag-waving and fund-raising

different police chiefs using those same words Handgun Control supports Metzenbaum So do a dozen law enforcement organizations `` Both sides are simply waving flags so believers will send money to Handgun Control Inc. and to the National Rifle Association , '' says John Aquilino , a former NRA official who now publishes John Aquilino own gun owners ' newsletter `` believers 're making advertising agencies very wealthy Handgun Control Inc. 's flag-waving and fund-raising .
International Association of Chiefs of Police
International Association of Chiefs of Police
N.T. `` Pete '' Shields , chairman of Handgun Control Inc.

McClure 's bill The group normally opposes any legislation that could bring more restrictions on firearms Only last May
NRA Governmental Affairs Director James Jay Baker

the only workable approach '' to the detection problem

security at airports NRA Governmental Affairs Director James Jay Baker said `` attempts to dictate metallic content of firearms or chemical composition of non-metallic components of firearms '' were unnecessary `` Their position from day one has been , there shall never be any law on guns , '' said N.T. `` Pete '' Shields , chairman of Handgun Control Inc.
Strom Thurmond , a conservative South Carolina Republican and ranking Republican on the Judiciary Committee Metzenbaum
